long sts stitches sk1p slip 1 knit 1 pass slipped stitch over knit version slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped 3 5 mm us 4 needles sk2p stitch over turn gauge t yarn over 24 sts = 4 in stocking stitch yo size 20 wide x 27 long 2 © 2022 wonder twin fibrearts design all rights reserved crochet pattern knit pattern instructions instructions note count turning ch3 as first double_crochet in each row cast on 123 sts work 2 row in garter stitch then begin working in pattern st chain 137 set up row double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 10 double_crochet skip 3 row 1 knit 1 k2tog k10 *yo k1 yo k10 sk2p chain 12 double_crochet chain 3 12 double_crochet skip 3 chain repeat 3 more k10 repeat from * to last 14sts yo k1 yo k10 times 12 double_crochet you will now have 120 double_crochet and 9 chain 3 sk1p k1 spaces chain 3 turn row 2 purl row 1 double_crochet in same stitch as the chain 3 2 double_crochet in next repeat row 1 & 2 until the blanket measures stitch 8 double_crochet skip 3 stitches 10 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 3 2dc approximately 26 5 long or desired length and in chain 3 space 10 double_crochet skip 3 stitches repeat 3 there is enough yarn left to work 2 row of garter st more times 8 double_crochet 2dc in each of the last 2 stitches and bind off all the sts block your blanket repeat row 1 until blanket reaches desired length fasten_off at the end of row and block your blanket 3 © 2022 wonder twin fibrearts design all rights reserved pattern notes making a gauge swatch add some eucalan soak or other wool wash knit using 3 5mm needles cast on approximately -submerge your new blanket and make sure it is 30sts work in stocking stitch for approximately thoroughly wet 4 10cm cast off wash your swatch in the same -let your blanket soak for 15-20 minutes -set a manner you will wash your final garment lay it timer or you may forget it flat to dry pinning the edges flat once completely -once your timer is finished you can remove the dry measure how many
